item.title: New Zealand Programming Contest 2021 Results
item.description: The contest this year was held entirely online because of the outbreak of the Delta Variant of Covid-19. Category Winners Scoreboard School Steve++, Burnside High School - team School Scoreboard Tertiary Junior Coding Coconuts, Victoria University of Wellington - team Tertiary Junior Scoreboard Tertiary Intermediate SE2 Noobies, University of Auckland - team Tertiary Intermediate Scoreboard Tertiary Open Trie-O, University of Auckland - team Tertiary Open Scoreboard Open YS, Independent - team Open Scoreboard Contest Problems

item.title: New Zealand Programming Contest 2022 Results
item.description: After 2 years of online contests, this year we were back on site. Category Winners Scoreboard School Syzygy, Mt Albert Grammar School - team School Scoreboard Tertiary Junior The Lobb Fan Club, University of Canterbury - team Tertiary Junior Scoreboard Tertiary Intermediate CAJ, University of Canterbury - team Tertiary Intermediate Scoreboard Tertiary Open cflat, University of Canterbury - team Tertiary Open Scoreboard Open Griffin, Independent - team Open Scoreboard Contest Problems
